metadata.title: CVE-2015-6748 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jsoup before 1.8.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjsoup-java - 1.8.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jsoup package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.3-1').
